description: This is a Flutter widget implementation for a messages screen, managing display, filtering, and interaction with message data, interacting with a MessageProvider for data management.

classes.name: MessagesScreen
classes.description: A stateful widget representing the message management and display interface for the app.

methods.name: initState
methods.description: Initializes the tab controller and triggers message loading.

methods.name: dispose
methods.description: Disposes of the tab controller to free resources.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the messages screen, including app bar, message lists, and dialogs.

methods.name: _buildMessagesList
methods.description: Constructs the list of messages based on filter criteria.

methods.name: _buildMessageCard
methods.description: Creates a card UI component for individual messages.

methods.name: _getTypeColor
methods.description: Returns a color based on message type.

methods.name: _getTypeIcon
methods.description: Returns an icon based on message type.

methods.name: _showMessageDetails
methods.description: Displays detailed information about a message, marks it as read.

methods.name: _showComposeDialog
methods.description: Placeholder for message composition functionality, here shows a snackbar.
